quoteText: access or search or attempt to access or search the Services by any means (automated or otherwise) other than through our currently available, published interfaces that are provided by Life On Air (and only pursuant to those terms and conditions), unless you have been specifically allowed to do so in a separate agreement with Life On Air (NOTE: scraping the Services without the prior consent of Life On Air is expressly prohibited);
title: Users cannot scrape the website of the service
